Posts.Content: I have breast cancer, 1.7x1.5 cm, estrogen and protesteron positive, Her-2/neu positive (+3), lymph node negative. After partial mastectomy last week,Â my doctor now suggests chemotherapy followed by Herceptin and radiation. Should I benefit from chemotherapy?
Posts.Title: chemo or no chemo?

Posts.Content: by the way, I am 36 and premenopausal.
Posts.Title: chemo or no chemo?
